1000010110001100 0100100101111101 1 -> sum: 1100111100001010, cout: 0
1011100000111101 0001001011101010 0 -> sum: 1100101100100111, cout: 0
0100000100011110 1101000011000011 0 -> sum: 0001000111100001, cout: 1
